description: An ostrich sits comfortably in an armchair in a domestic setting, reading a newspaper with a prominent headline about rising ax-murders. The environment includes a side table with a mug and a framed picture on the wall. The irony stems from a creature often associated with being prey engaging with news of violent human-style crime, suggesting a world where typical predator-prey dynamics are warped, or perhaps highlighting a general sense of unease that permeates even seemingly safe spaces.
caption: The Far Side by Gary Larson
